content: CPF PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by Robert Antonius HenruAsked on 02 Mar 2019Why do you think CPF SA as a safety net, considering it is one way investment, can be taken out only at 65?2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019You can take out at 55 once u leave aside the FRS. You dont lose the principal so its low risk and act as safety net because you will get them back at 55 or 65 through cpf life.0 comments0
Chen ZhirongLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Because even when you lose everything, you know you can take some out at 55 and 65.0 comments0
